coding_practice.title: Non-overlapping Intervals
coding_practice.description:
Given an array of intervals intervals where intervals[i] = [starti, endi], return the minimum number of intervals you need to remove to make the rest of the intervals non-overlapping.

Note that intervals which only touch at a point are non-overlapping. For example, [1, 2] and [2, 3] are non-overlapping.

examples.explanation: [1,3] can be removed and the rest of the intervals are non-overlapping.
You need to remove two [1,2] to make the rest of the intervals non-overlapping.
You don't need to remove any of the intervals since they're already non-overlapping.

coding_practice.explanation:
1. 將 intervals 按結束時間升序排序。
2. 初始化 end 為第一個區間的結束時間，count 記錄不重疊區間數。
3. 遍歷每個區間，如果當前區間的開始時間 >= end，則更新 end 並增加 count。
4. 最後需要移除的區間數 = 總區間數 - 不重疊區間數。
